name: Welcome to The Hive! [Multiplayer]
description:
This is an asymetric multiplayer online game when 1 player plays an alien and the rest humans in a malfunctioning space station. The alien needs to catch all humans and transform them into new aliens while the humans try to hide and stay human. But time is ticking and the Space Marines are on their way.  Will you join The Hive?

Game Dev, Level Design, Original Concept
